body_html:
Just one more thing: I was looking at the speedup of the derivative of torch.sqrt. These are the times for the existing versions and the proposed version:

existing new (with rsqrt()) new (with result)
0.5112064539998755 0.5018493099996704 0.04191653599991696

There is no difference in the values computed i.e., sum of absolute differences is 0 for both.

Code used for testing: https://gist.github.com/vishwakftw/bdc64559bbde055572f6751120c06f04

body:
Just one more thing: I was looking at the speedup of the derivative of `torch.sqrt`. These are the times for the existing versions and the proposed version:

| existing | new (with `rsqrt()`) | new (with `result`) |
| ---------- | ------------------------| ----------------------- |
| 0.5112064539998755 | 0.5018493099996704 | 0.04191653599991696 |

There is no difference in the values computed i.e., sum of absolute differences is 0 for both.

Code used for testing: https://gist.github.com/vishwakftw/bdc64559bbde055572f6751120c06f04
